body_html:
This part of the log might have something to do with it:

WARNING: Output base '/home/user1/.cache/bazel/_bazel_user1/d49ce44fa50589aa9a9d880466ef1baf' is on NFS. This may lead to surprising failures and undetermined behavior.

I think the appropriate resolution is to pass the flag --output_base=/tmp/some/other/dir (for example) to the bazel build command.
body_text:
This part of the log might have something to do with it:

WARNING: Output base '/home/user1/.cache/bazel/_bazel_user1/d49ce44fa50589aa9a9d880466ef1baf' is on NFS. This may lead to surprising failures and undetermined behavior.

I think the appropriate resolution is to pass the flag --output_base=/tmp/some/other/dir (for example) to the bazel build command.
body:
This part of the log might have something to do with it:

> WARNING: Output base '/home/user1/.cache/bazel/_bazel_user1/d49ce44fa50589aa9a9d880466ef1baf' is on NFS. This may lead to surprising failures and undetermined behavior.

I think the appropriate resolution is to pass the flag `--output_base=/tmp/some/other/dir` (for example) to the `bazel build` command.
